character.name: Cat & Amy
description: Two lovers lost in space. Their <c=keyword>pair</c> cards switch between top and bottom after each play, and specialize in <c=keyword>ship movement, dealing damage, and moving the enemy</c>.

description.both: This card has two separate sets of actions that flop after a <c=cardtrait>pair</c> card is played.
description.top: This card has two separate sets of actions that flop after a <c=cardtrait>pair</c> card is played. <c=442DB9>Cat</c> is currently up.
description.bottom: This card has two separate sets of actions that flop after a <c=cardtrait>pair</c> card is played. <c=442DB9>Amy</c> is currently up.

description.left: The enemy will instantly move {{Amount}} spaces to the <c=keyword>LEFT</c>.
description.right: The enemy will instantly move {{Amount}} spaces to the <c=keyword>RIGHT</c>.

Lovers.name: Lovers
Lovers.description: The next <c=keyword>{0}</c> <c=cardtrait>pair</c> cards you play are played in full. <c=downside>Goes away at end of turn.</c>

Switches.name: Switches
Switches.description: <c=442DB9>Cat & Amy's</c> <c=cardtrait>pair</c> cards are <c=cardtrait>dual</c>. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 at the end of your turn.</c>

Devotion.name: Devotion
Devotion.description: At the start of your turn, gain <c=keyword>{0}</c> <c=status>LOVERS</c>.

Kisses.name: Kisses
Kisses.description: At the start of your turn, add <c=keyword>{0}</c> <c=card>Kiss</c>es to your hand.

KissesA.name: Kisses (A)
KissesA.description: At the start of your turn, add <c=keyword>{0}</c> <c=card>Kiss A</c>s to your hand.

Reflex.name: Reflex
Reflex.description: Fire for <c=keyword>{0}</c> damage immediately after every move the opposing ship makes during your turn.

TempReflex.name: Temp Reflex
TempReflex.description: Fire for <c=keyword>{0}</c> damage immediately after every move the opposing ship makes during your turn. <c=downside>Goes away at end of turn.</c>

TempStrafe.name: Temp Strafe
TempStrafe.description: Fire for {0} damage immediately after every move you make. <c=downside>Goes away at start of turn.</c>

LeadOn.name: Lead On
LeadOn.description: After every move the opposing ship makes, this ship moves {0} additional spaces in the same direction. <c=downside>Goes away at end of turn.</c>

OverwhelmingAttraction.name: OVERWHELMING ATTRACTION
OverwhelmingAttraction.description: Every 4 times you switch <c=442DB9>Cat & Amy</c> by playing one of their <c=cardtrait>pair</c> cards, gain 1 <c=card>Kiss</c>.

HeartShapedCookies.name: HEART-SHAPED COOKIES
HeartShapedCookies.description: On pickup, add 2 non-<c=cardtrait>temp</c> <c=card>Kisses</c> to your deck. The second time you play a <c=card>Kiss</c> each turn, gain 1 <c=status>OVERDRIVE</c>.

WorkoutRoutine.name: WORKOUT ROUTINE
WorkoutRoutine.description: Gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c> whenever you switch <c=442DB9>Cat & Amy</c> by playing one of their <c=cardtrait>pair</c> cards for the <c=keyword>third</c> time in a turn.

SentimentalLocket.name: SENTIMENTAL LOCKET
SentimentalLocket.description: At the start of combat, gain 1 <c=card>Starcrossed Lovers</c>.

LoveLetters.name: LOVE LETTERS
LoveLetters.description: Every 4 times you switch <c=442DB9>Cat & Amy</c> by playing one of their <c?cardtrait>pair</c> cards, gain 1 <c=energy>ENERGY</c>.

PowerCouple.name: POWER COUPLE
PowerCouple.description:
When <c=442DB9>Amy</c> is up, attacks deal <c=action>+1 damage</c>. When <c=442DB9>Cat</c> is up, all attacks move the enemy <c=action>1 space to the left</c>, or <c=action>+1 space</c> if they already move the enemy.
<c=downside>All non-Cat&Amy attacks deal 1 less dmg.

LovesProtection.name: LOVE'S PROTECTION
LovesProtection.description: Every 2 times you switch <c=442DB9>Cat & Amy</c> by playing one of their <c=cardtrait>pair</c> cards, gain 1 <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>.

PerseveringPartnership.name: PERSEVERING PARTNERSHIP
PerseveringPartnership.description: <c=status>OVERDRIVE</c> will not decay if you switched <c=442DB9>Cat & Amy</c> by playing one of their pair cards at least 3 times.

LoveBomb.name: LOVE BOMB
LoveBomb.description: On pickup, add a <c=card>Repair Kit B</c> to your deck. Whenever you destroy a <c=drone>repair kit</c>, gain 1 <c=status>LOVERS</c>.

RainbowPride.name: RAINBOW PRIDE
RainbowPride.description: Every 5 times you switch <c=442DB9>Cat & Amy</c> by playing one of their pair cards, gain 1 <c=status>BOOST</c>.

CrystalGirlies.name: CRYSTAL GIRLIES
CrystalGirlies.description: At the end of your turn, spend 2 <c=status>SHARD</c> to gain 1 <c=status>LOVERS</c> .

AmySandwich.name: AMY SANDWICH
AmySandwich.description: Once per combat, gain 1 <c=status>REFLEX</c> after the 10th <c=comp>CAT</c> card you play.
